metadata.title: Wednesday, 28th November, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Agriculture and Livestock how many of the following activities were undertaken in 2011 country-wide
parts: (b)    construction and rehabilitation of fish breeding centres; and

(c)    rehabilitation of fish training centres.
